text:
I have:

Alias /foo /some/foo/directory

directory with +Indexes

then I open http://localhost/foo  I get files from /some/foo/directory  but if I
click on any file I get 404 and URL change to http://localhost/file instead
http://localhost/foo/file

I have looked into #23665 but this case is different
creator: krzak@pld-linux.org
nd@perlig.de
text:
If the server doesn't send a redirect to /foo/, then, of course, the paths are
wrong, because you have a configuration problem. Please ask on a user support
forum, how to resolve this.
